kpi.name: M5006C12

kpi_info.title: BTS R99 CHANNEL ELEMENT TOTAL UTILIZATION IN UL - CLASS 4
kpi_info.use: The counter shows how many utilization rate samples have been detected within the (80 - <90)% class per uplink direction. Each utilization rate sample calculates the total number of R99 Channel Elements in use divided by the number of all available (licensed) R99 CEs. UPDATED: The counter is incremented when the sample of the utilization rate is within (80 - <90)% class.

kpi.kpi_alias: BTS R99 CHANNEL ELEMENT TOTAL UTILIZATION IN UL - CLASS 4
